original_text: And I, Daniel, alone saw the vision, for the men who were with me did not see the vision, but a great trembling fell upon them, and they fled to hide themselves.
korean_text: 이 환상을 나 다니엘이 홀로 보았고 나와 함께 한 사람들은 이 환상은 보지 못하였어도 그들이 크게 떨며 도망하여 숨었느니라

sentences.original_text: And I, Daniel, alone saw the vision
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나 다니엘은 홀로 그 환상을 보았으니

sentences.original_text: for the men who were with me
but a great trembling fell upon them
and they fled to hide themselves
